text: kisee eemaanavaale ka yah kaam nahin ki vah kisee eemaanavaale ka hatya kare, bhool-chook kee baat aur hai. aur yadi koee kyakti yadi galatee se kisee eemaanavaale kee hatya kar de, to ek momin gulaam ko aazaad karana hoga aur arthadand us (maare gae kyakti) ke gharavaalon ko saumpa jae. yah aur baat hai ki ve apanee khushee se chhod den. aur yadi vah un logon mein se ho, jo tumhaare shatru hon aur vah (maara jaanevaala) svayan momin raha to ek momin ko gulaamee se aazaad karana hoga. aur yadi vah un logon mein se ho ki tumhaare aur unake beech koee sandhi aur samajhauta ho, to arthadand usake gharavaalon ko saumpa jae aur ek momin ko gulaamee se aazaad karana hoga. lekin jo (gulaam) na pae to vah nirantar do maas ke roze rakhe. yah allaah kee or se nishchit kiya hua usakee taraf palat aane ka tareeqa hai. allaah to sab kuchh jaananevaala, tatvadarshee hai
